name: The Memories Of Assassin
description:
Memories Of an Assassin.

B.C 3500 in the ancient Egypt.
A man woke up on his bed but can not remember anything. He has no memory of his past not even his name.
He must find out who he is.

Enjoy the adventurous run through an ancient century Egypt village where 'fight to survive' has become a guiding creed for many people.Where Hatred, bigotry, and ignorance don't need any particular creed. Complete the missions, solve the riddles, pass through dungeons, assassinate enemies to find out who you are.
Too much action and mystery.
Are you ready to help him and solve the mystery of ancient Egypt treasure ?
Intractable world, Different dungeons, Difficult Enemies.
